name: Zombie Shooting Game (Official_amazingQ_Scratch)
description:
Welcome to zombie shooting game!! (1,345 CODES!!!)

- Arrow keys to move

- Space to shoot bullets

- Defeat all zombies as possible

- 1-2 to switch guns

- P to open shop and press P again to close it.

- Enjoy this game! And discover new zombies!

- Some sound from youtube/scratch library.

- The Bomb In the shop is very rare.

- The secret is super rare!!
